## Epic: Design Tool Enhancements

**Priority:** P2 — User-facing features
**Scope:** New drawing tools (polygon, arrows, snapping, bezier handles) and UI components (accordion, carousel)
**Depends on:** Epic 2 (node-type renderers extracted)

### Issues
- [ ] 3.1 Polygon tool
- [ ] 3.2 Arrow features on line tool
- [ ] 3.3 Alignment and position snapping
- [ ] 3.4 Bezier handles on curve tool with smooth/sharp toggle
- [ ] 3.5 Component library — Accordion
- [ ] 3.6 Component library — Carousel

### Exit Criteria
- Each tool has: node type in schema, renderer, toolbar integration, property panel controls, and at least 2 test cases
